title: Vidal Design is here.
content:
Dear friends, receive a hot greeting from Ecuador, half of the world.  
I invite them to write [www.aladiecuador.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080628180721/http:/www.aladiecuador.com/ "www.aladiecuador.com") to live and to share a design moment.  
I wait their comments.

A hug,  
Vidal Design

Andres,

wonderful treatment of logo for ALADI Ecuador.

Ecuador en la mitad para todo el mundo.  
[IMG]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v720/vidal1951/Caricature/cabecera\_fc.jpg[/IMG]

Thank you Norbert Florendo for your welcome and support words.  
I take two years of investigation with the Before Columbus Cultures and I won the competition among 12 Latin American countries.  
The justification and defense that she/he played me to sustain openly in Rosario, Argentina is in the page.  
The corresponding typography that I call it VIDALADI is also.  
In this site, there will always be a space for you.

A hug,  
Vidal Design

Ecuador en la mitad para todo el mundo.  
[IMG]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v720/vidal1951/Caricature/cabecera\_fc.jpg[/IMG]

Thank you, Andres.

Did you know that Typophile has a special topic [**Comunidad Hispana**](http://web.archive.org/web/20080628180721/http:/typophile.com/forum/12) in the “Special Interest Groups” section.

Gracias Norbert Florendo, in some moment the slip. In general I am in forums of countries of different continents to have a global perspective of the design  
and to revert this experience of to share and to acquire knowledge to my students.

I participate in competitions of Rumania, Germany, Ireland, France, Italy, among other...

I memorizes very much.  
My teacher was a German designer, Peter Mussfeldt.

A hug,  
Vidal
